title: Spider

properties.name: description
properties.value: Spiders are found all over Gielinor, but most notably in the Stronghold of Security, where they can be found at Combat level 24 and in large numbers. Most level 2 spiders have a relatively slow attack speed, with only the spiders in the Underground pass being an exception. Spiders are usually considered a nuisance and drop no items. It should also be noted that the level 24 spiders are aggressive and can hit up to 6 damage. They give 22 Slayer experience per kill.

This article is about the NPC found all over RuneScape. For other uses, see Spider (disambiguation).
 This article has a Slayer task guide here.
Information comparing locations for Slayer tasks will be on this page

Spiders are found all over Gielinor, but most notably in the Stronghold of Security, where they can be found at Combat level 24 and in large numbers. Most level 2 spiders have a relatively slow attack speed, with only the spiders in the Underground pass being an exception. Spiders are usually considered a nuisance and drop no items. It should also be noted that the level 24 spiders are aggressive and can hit up to 6 damage. They give 22 Slayer experience per kill.

Contents

  • 1 Locations
  • 2 Drops
    • 2.1 Tertiary
    • 2.2 Wilderness Slayer tertiary
